about.title: About
about.name: Nelson Thaksakorn
about.textone: Nelson Thaksakorn is a photographer based in Bangkok, Thailand.
about.texttwo: He passionates in travel, landscape, aerial, astrophotography and moodyscape, never stop to challenging the boundaries of creativity as well as a flair for coming up with unique ideas.
about.textthree: He loves to capture moments of nature and finds the beauty in the usual.
about.textfour: Mostly inspired by music, contemporary fine art, nature and traveling, his photos are presented almost as stills from something out of a movie or a dream.
